subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire leapfrogged Boston’s Kevin Garnett in the latest All-Star balloting returns, putting him in line to become the first Knick since Patrick Ewing in 1992 to start the game.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire leapfrogged Boston’s Kevin Garnett in the latest All-Star balloting returns, putting him in line to become the first Knick since Patrick Ewing in 1992 to start the game.
